segment.source: Orvium is an open platform in which everyone is invited to collaborate.
Create your community in Orvium and start managing your conference, journal or scientific repository in a few minutes.
The publication needs some small changes to be published

We couldn't find Metamask extension installed in your browser. Please, install the extension and try again. If you have any questions please feel free to check our user guide or contact us through the feedback button bellow.
The publication is ready to be published
Discover about what matters to you
The publication contains errors that must be corrected
File is being processed. Please click Refresh if it does not update automatically.
You need to accept iThenticate EULA before using this feature.
You have ORVs unlocked and ready for deposit.
Turn a GitHub repo into a collection of interactive notebooks. Orvium uses Binder to open those notebooks in an executable environment, making your code immediately reproducible by anyone, anywhere.
Optional settings to link github repositories
Add relevant dates for your community and keep everyone updated, ie: Call for Papers deadlines, Conference dates, etc.
Following the official community's guidelines, authors will have to acknowledge when submitting a new publication:
Optional settings for this publication in the Blochchain
File extension is not supported by iThenticate. Accepted extensions are: docx, doc, xml, pdf, tex, html, rtf and wpd.
Edit and manage the information displayed about your community
Following options allows you to select which users will see the identity of the reviewers
To edit a reference click on the one you want to modify and scroll down until you reach the text area where you can add your changes. Finally click the "Save Reference" button.
Use the blockchain to access extra features such as proving of the ownership of your work and get rewards for the peer reviews you make.
Everyone can create a peer review
You can edit the preview of your publication directly here, the changes will reflect immediately after saving, and if a new publication file is uploaded this content will be refreshed.
Following options allow moderators to define who can create peer reviews
Choose the file extensions allowed for the submission of articles.
This link doesn't have a proper format
The switch below will show or hide a "Calendar" button on your community landing page. If no dates are entered, the button won't be displayed.
A global community of researchers like you
Only invited reviewers can create peer reviews
If you are not sure about this action, you can read more details at here.
No references have been added yet,
You must select at least one license!
Similarity Report is being processed. Please click Refresh if it does not update automatically.
This community has no active calls for now.
Press Save to preview your changes.
No authors have been added yet.
This article state does not allow changes.
Save the Ownership of your publication storing your authorship in the blockchain
Following options will allow you to define the author's permissions when inviting reviewers to their publications
Remember to press the submit button when you finish your article to send it to the community editorial board.
This article state does not allow changes.
Show review to the publication author
This is not a valid language format
Please, put a valid ISSN code
This article cannot be edit. You may not upload new files but you can download the existing ones.
Unlock and deposit your ORVs, so reviewers can see how much you're willing to reward:
Entering a valid ORCID will try to populate missing fields
Preview automatically generated form the publication file.
This is not a valid format, positive number expected
When you confirm this transaction, the Orvium smart contract will take ORV tokens from your wallet executing the ERC20 method "transferFrom".
ORCID has to be like this: https://orcid.org/0000-0000-0000-0000

Please complete the following form to submit your work. Before clicking the "Submit" button, please ensure your submission is ready as you will not be able to make any further changes. If you have any questions or concerns, please refer to our user guide for assistance.
This community will be submitted and reviewed by Orvium. Do you want to continue?
You have to choose a license type
Following options allows you to select which users will see the review
* You have been invited to review this publication. Go to My Reviews to manage the invitation.
There was an error processing the file. Error code: . Please contact Orvium.

To edit a reference click on the one you want to modify and scroll down until you reach the text area where you can add your changes. Finally click the "Save Reference" button. Once you have all your references click the "Save publication references" button.
No reviews to show. Please remember to LOG IN as some reviews may be only visible to specific users.
Please read and acknowledge the following requirements before submitting:
If you want to know more, please watch our explainer video here.
The author has deposited i18n ORV tokens for peer review rewards.
The following options will allow you to define the author's permissions when inviting reviewers to their publications
This is not a valid ISSN format
No references have been added yet.
Upload your review. Preview your work and validate it before sending it.
Use the blockchain to access extra features such as proving of the ownership of your work and get rewards for the peer reviews you make.
Everyone can see the reviewer identity
There is a newer version for this publication.
The author can see the reviewer identity
We will check the content, format and metadata of your review.

From here you will have access to the status of all your invitations. It is important to remember to promptly accept or reject each invitation in order to effectively communicate your decision to the requester.
Now your review is published and will provide with helpful feedback.
Preview automatically generated from the review file.
Or if you prefer, you can see the full process in the following video.
Only editors can see the reviewer identity
has not uploaded any publication yet
Remember to press the submit button when you finish your review to send it to the community editorial board.
Only editors can see the review and the report
You can learn more about how to create a new publication
has not reviewed any publication yet
The author can see the review and the report
Everyone can see the review and the report
Save the Ownership of your review storing your authorship in the blockchain
This review don't have any extra file

From here you will have access to the status of all your reviews. Once you have accepted an invitation, you will be able to proceed with the review creation process and ultimately submit your evaluation. This entire workflow can be efficiently managed from this central location.
Activate Blockchain functionality to use these features
